import numpy as np

import morphforge.units as units



[docs]class AlphaBetaCalculator(object):

    @classmethod

[docs]    def calc_alpha_beta(cls, V, ab):
        v = V.rescale('mV').magnitude
        alphabeta = (ab[0] + ab[1] * v) / (ab[2] + np.exp((ab[3] + v) / ab[4]))
        alphabeta = alphabeta * (units.J / units.J)
        return alphabeta



[docs]class InfTauCalculator(object):
    @classmethod

[docs]    def alpha_beta_to_inf_tau(cls, alpha, beta):
        inf = alpha / (alpha + beta)
        tau = 1.0 / (alpha + beta) * units.milli * units.second
        return (inf, tau)


    @classmethod

[docs]    def evaluate_inf_tau_for_v(cls, (alphaParams, betaParams), V):
        (alpha, beta) = AlphaBetaCalculator.getAlphaBeta(V, alphaParams, betaParams)
        (inf, tau) = InfTauCalculator.alpha_beta_to_inf_tau(alpha, beta)
        return (inf, tau)




[docs]class ReportLabTools(object):

    @classmethod

[docs]    def build_alpha_beta_table(cls, elements, reportlabconfig, title, params):

        from reportlab.platypus import Paragraph, Table
        elements.append(Paragraph(title, reportlabconfig.styles['Heading4']))
        print params
        print
        alpha_params = '%2.2f %2.2f %2.2f %2.2f %2.2f' % tuple(params)
        alpha_table_data = [['A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E'],
                            alpha_params.split()]
        elements.append(Table(alpha_table_data,
                        style=reportlabconfig.defaultTableStyle))
